title: Miss Fortune Redesign Sketch!
body:
Hey everybody! I made a quick Miss Fortune redesign sketch tonight because I'm SO excited for her model updates! I know her design probably isn't going to change much when her update rolls around, but I wanted to see what I could come up with. Figured I'd share it with you guys to see what you think. I can't wait for the Bilgewater event! If I have time I'm going to try to make this into a completely rendered concept.

https://40.media.tumblr.com/c8f2f92275efa2fdeaea060b4da55532/tumblr_inline_nqjbkgmAkX1qiaw9q_540.png

EDIT

Started a bit of rough rendering! Added a few details to her legs to break up all the brown!

https://41.media.tumblr.com/941a8572570c31b0bcfc559ae8d723ca/tumblr_inline_nqjiy184Tt1qiaw9q_540.png

replies.body:
**Love it.** Really clean and elegant, with a much more eye pleasing color palette. If anything, the toning-down of all the oversaturated colors in her outfit really helps her trademark scarlet hair stand out like it should. Good job keeping the stereotypical desirable female form intact, without carrying over those archaic pornstar-level proportions (her current splash art is obnoxious).

This design looks perfectly at home on the redesigned rift map, much smoother textures and calmer coloring without sacrificing noticeable amounts of detail, and honestly looks about the quality of a piece of a concept art I might find floating around Riot's offices today.

Your {{champion:99}} redesign was amazing and well thought out (still my favorite of your works), and this {{champion:21}} redesign is no exception. I personally find your visual upgrades the most interesting of your art pieces, please keep them coming!
Thank you so much! Whenever I redesign an older champ lately I've been trying to prioritize readability on the new rift, so it means a lot to me that you think it's working!

Something could be done about the colors on her lower half. The fact that her pants and boots are the same color causes a bit of unneeded monotony. The design is wonderful, don't get me wrong. I like the more classy MF look. What if her pants were more of a de-saturated brownish dark red. Since her hair is red already, it wouldn't feel out of place.

Something like this. http://i.imgur.com/iymrwaZ.jpg

I see your point! I think making the pants red is a bit dangerous in terms of readability because it might make it difficult to distinguish her legs from her hair when you're looking at her from behind in a top down perspective. I added some gold embellishment and lining on the boots to break up the brown in the post itself, but I was thinking maybe either making her pants the same material as her sleeves to add some variety or darken her boots and gloves to differentiate her limbs from her torso?
https://41.media.tumblr.com/1a7ea4cc26134897e9240894369adf63/tumblr_inline_nqk7rzNVP81qiaw9q_540.png
https://41.media.tumblr.com/4737cb378016cf4b5fde42db26a02a09/tumblr_inline_nqk7tattt81qiaw9q_540.png
I like the darkened gloves and boots
{{champion:21}}  main approves

As always, beautiful artwork. 

I love the new Corset look instead of the design she currently has (because whether it's supposed to be fan service or not it is just way to unbelievable of an outfit right now) The hat and boot design are also much superior to her current model (I mean really, her current hat is just a pyramid with a hat texture slapped on top). The only thing I feel it lacks is a redesign for her pistols, which are both integral to her design but sorely outdated at the moment. Keep up the great work!
I'll try to get an idea for her pistols up soon! I think the way they look in her current splash is really nice, so just some model updates to reflect that would be wonderful.

IT IS WELL DONE, VERY WELL DONE.
http://38.media.tumblr.com/a69a718b82e2b699f22f59cdbe9e42e9/tumblr_n9qj6n6A5S1smcbm7o1_400.gif
Is that the Ferris Bueller actor?
Rito pls... We want Ferris Beuller as a champion! Can you imagine that OP kit? xD
I never get tired of your redesigns man. Who's next? Akali, Eve, Irelia? You've redesigned all your faves already I think.

Its the first time I see your artwork, but I have to say this one amazed me, it looks super clean and it has style like her pose in which she is standing and also the clothes that MF wears are so detailed, overall gj
I actually liked it nice job man.
Great Job!!

omg <3 I love this concept...she looks lovely! I love the approach and how she looks like the current MF but "updated".

[img]http://i.imgur.com/IOKIboyl.jpg[/img]

That was a little sketch I did sometime ago....the original post is over here http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/0Ux8fEg3-mf-vu

I think MF needs to be more femenine-flamboyant...maybe some feathers on her hat, and look more like a captain that she is....the current one have clothes that I my opinion resemble common ppl from bilgewater, if it wasnt for the hat...I wouldnt know MF is a captain or a pirate....and she doesnt look or feel like a legendary bounty hunter....but I think thats a gameplay issue.
Finally some healthy breasts
Don't discriminate against big boobies! :/
i like it but .... not enough skin!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! the inner pervert me is crying from not seeing enough skin on mf!

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=69HUTQZn,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2015-06-26T19:18:12.717+0000)
>
> Well that's too bad for you. He did a great job of keeping her appearance in line with society's stereotypical standards for above-average attractiveness (to stay true to her lore and flirty VO). I'm sorry if you miss seeing her ridiculous bust size and fully exposed midriff, but it's time that League of Legends moves on from the fap-material-for-12-year-olds-who-have-NetNanny-on-their-computer fodder into something that makes it easier to take the game seriously, and i'm praying that her obnoxious soaking-wet-in-lingerie splash art gets replaced as well.
> 
> If you are still having issues determining how you will cope with the loss of her original design, please consider opening a private browsing session and availing yourself to the mind-boggling amounts of free explicit media that we all use to keep such periodic compulsions under control.

Fucking feminazi.
Really? Go tell a kid to jack off to porn? You make me sick.

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=69HUTQZn,comment-id=0007000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-27T01:27:03.605+0000)
>
> Lol i'm male. I graduated from high school it's all, sorry I don't get horny off of videogame characters and throw a fit when my digital waifu gets changed. I just advocated the use of prnography so i'm not sure why exactly you would even think I am a feminist in any way.

Youre the kind of casual that ruins video games. You probably jack off to saggy granny tits.
So just from looking at the fine details, you think MF wears a thong? I'm not trying to be a "pervert" just asking you your honest opinion
I think what you're referring to are the two lines on her abdomen? Those were just marks to delineate the anatomy there for later on when I paint it, it's not clothing! C:
THONGSS!!!! <3
Looks pretty nice. I like the sleeves :3

Thanks! I was approaching it from the mindset that Miss fortune has several visual components that players are used to seeing when they're playing as her- namely her hat, her hair and her frills- as they're currently the largest part of her model by a wide margin (lol). It's similar because I wanted to keep the core characteristics of Miss Fortune and what people associate with her intact. I don't think Miss Fortune is as outdated as, say, old Sivir was to justify a 100% complete visual overhaul, just some model updates and tweaks to her design! Like I said, though, I wouldn't be surprised if her design wasn't changed when her Model and Texture Update is released.
Very, VERY good. She could finally be Miss Fortune instead of Miss Whoretune.
Good, I can masturbate to this.
